verses.verse: "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> my eye <S%H5869><s%> has seen <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> [this,] My ear <S%H241><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> and understood <S%H995><s%> it.
"What <S%H1847><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> I also <S%H1571><s%> know. <S%H1847><s%> I am not inferior <S%H5307><s%> to you.
"But I would speak <S%H1696><s%> to the Almighty, <S%H7706><s%> And I desire <S%H2654><s%> to argue <S%H3198><s%> with God. <S%H410><s%>
"But you smear <S%H2950><s%> with lies; <S%H8267><s%> You are all <S%H3605><s%> worthless <S%H457><s%> physicians. <S%H7495><s%>
"O <S%H4310><s%> that you would be completely <S%H2790><s%> silent, <S%H2790><s%> And that it would become <S%H1961><s%> your wisdom! <S%H2451><s%>
"Please <S%H4994><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> my argument, <S%H9640><s%> And listen <S%H7181><s%> to the contentions <S%H7379><s%> of my lips. <S%H8193><s%>
"Will you speak <S%H1696><s%> what <S%H9390><s%> is unjust <S%H9390><s%> for God, <S%H410><s%> And speak <S%H1696><s%> what <S%H7423><s%> is deceitful <S%H7423><s%> for Him?
"Will you show <S%H5375><s%> partiality <S%H6440><s%> <S%H5375><s%> for Him? Will you contend <S%H7378><s%> for God <S%H410><s%>?
"Will it be well <S%H2896><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> He examines <S%H2713><s%> you? Or <S%H518><s%> will you deceive <S%H8524><s%> Him as one deceives <S%H8524><s%> a man <S%H582><s%>?
"He will surely <S%H3198><s%> reprove <S%H3198><s%> you, If <S%H518><s%> you secretly <S%H5643><s%> show <S%H5375><s%> partiality. <S%H6440><s%> <S%H5375><s%>
"Will not His majesty <S%H7613><s%> terrify <S%H1204><s%> you, And the dread <S%H6343><s%> of Him fall <S%H5307><s%> on you?
"Your memorable <S%H2146><s%> sayings <S%H2146><s%> are proverbs <S%H4912><s%> of ashes, <S%H665><s%> Your defenses <S%H1354><s%> are defenses <S%H1354><s%> of clay. <S%H2563><s%>
"Be silent <S%H2790><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> me so that I may speak; <S%H1696><s%> Then let come <S%H5674><s%> on me what <S%H4100><s%> may.
"Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> should I take <S%H5375><s%> my flesh <S%H1320><s%> in my teeth, <S%H8127><s%> And put <S%H7760><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> in my hands <S%H3709><s%>?
"Though <S%H2005><s%> He slay <S%H6991><s%> me, I will hope <S%H3176><s%> in Him. Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> I will argue <S%H3198><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Him.
"This <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> will be my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> For a godless <S%H2611><s%> man <S%H2611><s%> may not come <S%H935><s%> before His presence. <S%H6440><s%>
"Listen <S%H8085><s%> carefully <S%H8085><s%> to my speech, <S%H4405><s%> And let my declaration <S%H262><s%> [fill] your ears. <S%H241><s%>
"Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> I have prepared <S%H6186><s%> my case; <S%H4941><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that I will be vindicated. <S%H6663><s%>
"Who <S%H4310><s%> will contend <S%H7378><s%> with me? For then <S%H6258><s%> I would be silent <S%H2790><s%> and die. <S%H1478><s%>
"Only <S%H389><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> things <S%H8147><s%> do not do <S%H6213><s%> to me, Then <S%H227><s%> I will not hide <S%H5641><s%> from Thy face: <S%H6440><s%>
Remove <S%H7368><s%> Thy hand <S%H3709><s%> from me, And let not the dread <S%H367><s%> of Thee terrify <S%H1204><s%> me.
"Then call, <S%H7121><s%> and I will answer; <S%H6030><s%> Or <S%H176><s%> let me speak, <S%H1696><s%> then reply <S%H7725><s%> to me.
"How <S%H4100><s%> many <S%H4100><s%> are my iniquities <S%H5771><s%> and sins <S%H9128><s%>? Make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> to me my rebellion <S%H6588><s%> and my sin. <S%H9128><s%>
"Why <S%H4100><s%> dost Thou hide <S%H5641><s%> Thy face, <S%H6440><s%> And consider <S%H2803><s%> me Thine enemy <S%H340><s%>?
"Wilt Thou cause <S%H6206><s%> a driven <S%H5086><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%> to tremble <S%H6206><s%>? Or wilt Thou pursue <S%H7291><s%> the dry <S%H3002><s%> chaff <S%H7179><s%>?

"For Thou dost write <S%H3789><s%> bitter <S%H4846><s%> things <S%H4846><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, And dost make me to inherit <S%H3423><s%> the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of my youth. <S%H5271><s%>

"Thou dost put <S%H7760><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in the stocks, <S%H5465><s%> And dost watch <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my paths; <S%H734><s%> Thou dost set <S%H2707><s%> a limit <S%H2707><s%> for the soles <S%H8328><s%> of my feet, <S%H7272><s%>
While I am decaying <S%H1086><s%> like a rotten <S%H7538><s%> thing, <S%H7538><s%> Like a garment <S%H899><s%> that is moth-eaten.
